about_the_game:
This Deep Sea Pack includes 10 underwater Clothing Items, 1 underwater Wig, 10 underwater Furniture Items, 1 underwater Mount, and 1 underwater Pet.

Get your life vests on, it’s time to dive into the Deep Sea Pack! This pack is overflowing with 23 underwater-themed items that can turn any farm into an ocean-lover's paradise.

Pack includes:
  • Underwater Furniture Set: Underwater Clam Chair, Underwater Nightstand, Underwater Table, Underwater Wardrobe, Underwater Bed, Sand Dollar Rug, Starfish Rug, Jellyfish Lamp, Hidden Pearl Clam, and Small Seaweed
  • Mermaid Outfit Set: Mermaid Dress and Mermaid Crown
  • Wetsuit Outfit Set: Wetsuit Top, Wetsuit Pants, and Wetsuit Scuba Goggles
  • Jellyfish Outfit Set: Jellyfish Dress and Jellyfish Hat
  • Octopus Outfit Set: Octopus Dress and Octopus Hat
  • Wild Mermaid Outfit Set: Wild Mermaid Dress and Wild Mermaid Kelp Wig
  • Jellyfish Mount
  • Jiggles, the Jellyfish Pet
